categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: The Krikthasi Massacre occurred when the Sith Lord Dakron visited the planet Baralou, homeworld of the Krikthasi, in 3644 BBY. Darkon wished to learn about Krikthasi history, but when the species refused the Sith destroyed their capital city.
